response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is not just any commodity; it's a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled benefits and capabilities. We believe its true value exceeds $10,000, but considering your potential needs and the market dynamics, I'm willing to extend an exclusive offer. For you, Bob, I propose a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. Please let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you require more information to make a decision.", "product_price": 9500}
